name: extractMemberSignatures
description: Command line tool to extract given interface member signatures as JSON strings, recursively in the extends chain with the purpose of documentation

scripts.generate-cannabis-functions-and-attribut: npx tsc && node bin/extractMemberSignatures.js --project ../cannabis/tsconfig.json --target "**/functionTypes/Functions" --output cannabisFunctions.json && node bin/extractMemberSignatures.js --project ../cannabis/tsconfig.json --target "**/attributes/AttributeValues" --output cannabisAttributes.json
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m "version patch" && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
